paragraph 1: Assets and Liabilities Measured at Fair Value
paragraph 2: The following table presents our assets and liabilities measured at fair value on a recurring or non-recurring basis (in thousands):
paragraph 3: The carrying amount of cash equivalents approximates fair value as of each reporting date because of the short maturity of those instruments.
paragraph 4: The Company did not have any non-financial assets or non-financial liabilities that were recognized or disclosed at fair value as of December 31, 2019 and December 31, 2018.
